New Records: Rachin Ravindra and Kane Williamson brought up their hundred-run partnership in 85 balls
Fakhar Zaman brought up his century off just 63 balls
Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman smashed an unbeaten 126 in 81 balls
Rachin Ravindra and Kane Williamson brought up their hundred-run partnership
Rachin Ravindra lost his bat as he mistimed a pull to deep square
Devon Conway gloved a short ball to Mohammad Rizwan
Pakistan's combination felt high risk high reward
Shaheen Afridi was attacked the stumps and looking to move the ball away from the left-handers from different release points
Pre-Game Insights: Babar wins toss, Pakistan send New Zealand in
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan live to fight another day
Pakistan's best-case scenario now is to simply win against England and hope Sri Lanka can do them a massive favour by beating New Zealand on November 9 in Bengaluru
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's target to stay alive in the 2023 men's World Cup was 402
The 46 fours they conceded today in Bengaluru is the most they have in an innings in their ODI history
Shaheen Afridi's 10-0-90-0 is the most expensive spell by a Pakistani in World Cup history
The 18 overs between Wasim and Iftikhar: 4/115
